title: TPB AFK - The Pirate Bay Away From Keyboard
description:
It's the day before the trial starts. Fredrik packs a computer into a rusty old Volvo. Along with his Pirate Bay co-founders, he faces $13 million in damage claims to Hollywood in a copyright infringement case. Fredrik is on his way to install a new computer in the secret server hall. This is where the world's largest file sharing site is hidden. When the hacker prodigy Gottfrid, the internet activist Peter and the network nerd Fredrik are found gulity, they are confronted with the reality of life offline - away from the keyboard. But deep down in the dark data centres, clandestine computers quietly continue to duplicate files.


COPYRIGHT INFRINGMENT IS ILLEGAL ... 


THIS DOCUMENTARY TELLS THE STORY OF THEPIRATEBAY FOUNDERS THAT THINK THAT US LAW DOES NOT APPLY TO THEM. 


NOW POLITE AS EVER GO FUCK YOURSELVES TPB
